We focus on precision, innovation, and customer satisfaction, serving diverse industries worldwide. Our commitment to excellence ensures every project is executed with care and expertise:

our-mission-dic: At Turkal Aluminium, our mission is to provide tailored aluminium profile solutions for every need, ensuring precision and excellence in every project, no matter the complexity or scale.
best-quality-dic: At Turkal Aluminium, we aim to deliver the highest quality standards in every project.

experienced-dic: With over 25 years of expertise, Turkal Aluminium ensures precision and excellence in every project.
extrusion-dic: Extrusion is a manufacturing process in which material is pushed or drawn through a shaped die to create a continuous, uniform product.
polishing-dic: Polishing is a surface finishing process that removes imperfections and creates a smooth, reflective surface on metal, plastic, glass, or other materials.
punching-dic: Punching is a metal fabrication process in which a punch is used to create holes or shapes in metal sheets or plates.
powder-coating-dic: Powder coating is a type of coating process used to provide a protective and decorative finish on metal and other materials.
anodizing-dic: Anodizing is an electrochemical process used to increase the thickness of the natural oxide layer on the surface of metal parts, primarily aluminum.
packaging-dic: We pack our aluminum profiles according to our customers' requests. we use the best quality cartons and labels.

about-us-at-turkal-aluminium: At Turkal Aluminium, we pride ourselves on being a leading manufacturer of high-quality aluminium profiles, serving a broad spectrum of industries worldwide. With a foundation built on precision, innovation, and customer satisfaction, we are committed to providing solutions that meet the highest standards of excellence.Our expertise spans across various sectors, including construction, automotive, furniture, solar energy, and more. Whether you need aluminium profiles for architectural designs, industrial applications, or custom projects, we have the capability and flexibility to deliver products tailored to your specific requirements.We are dedicated to maintaining a global presence by exporting our products to customers around the world, reflecting our dedication to quality and reliability. Our diverse product range includes standard profiles and bespoke designs in various shapes, sizes, and finishes to suit every application.At Turkal Aluminium, we prioritize environmentally friendly practices in our production processes, contributing to a greener future. Leveraging cutting-edge technology, we continuously enhance our manufacturing capabilities to meet the evolving demands of our clients.Our aluminium profiles are designed to provide durability, functionality, and aesthetic appeal. Whether you are looking for profiles for construction projects, protective trims, or decorative elements, Turkal Aluminium is your trusted partner.We invite you to experience the quality and reliability that define our brand. Contact us today to discuss your needs, and let us help you bring your projects to life with precision-crafted aluminium solutions.
with-over-25-years: With over 25 years of experience, Turkal Aluminium has successfully completed hundreds of projects across various industries. Our expertise and commitment to quality make us the trusted partner for all your aluminium profile needs.
ceo-message-1: Turkal Aluminium is a leading manufacturer based in Istanbul, Turkey, specializing in the extrusion of aluminum profiles for a wide range of applications, including tiles, ceramics, walls, and floors, as well as sectors such as furniture, automotive, and solar energy. With a firm commitment to innovation and environmental responsibility, we have developed an extensive portfolio of high-quality aluminum tile trims and finishing profiles that not only protect exposed tile edges but also provide an attractive, neat finish, enhancing the overall aesthetics of any project. Our profiles, available in a variety of shapes, colors, and sizes, open the door to limitless design possibilities and offer a compelling alternative to conventional trim solutions.
ceo-message-2: At Turkal Aluminium, we take pride in our state-of-the-art production methods that emphasize energy efficiency and sustainable material usage, ensuring that our manufacturing processes have minimal impact on the environment while delivering superior quality. Every product is crafted with precision and undergoes rigorous quality control, ensuring reliability and durability that meet the highest industry standards. Our environmentally conscious approach is integrated into every aspect of our operations, from sourcing raw materials to the final finishing touches, reflecting our dedication to protecting our planet for future generations.
ceo-message-3: Our commitment to excellence is further demonstrated by our competitive pricing, reliable logistics network, and punctual delivery, which together guarantee that your projects can proceed seamlessly from design to completion. Whether you are a contractor, builder, or wholesaler, our experienced team is ready to collaborate closely with you to provide tailored aluminum profile solutions that meet your specific requirements. With a focus on both functional and aesthetic demands, we continuously adapt to evolving market needs and technological advancements, ensuring that our products remain at the forefront of innovation in the industry.
ceo-message-4: Today, Turkal Aluminium exports its premium profiles from Turkey to markets around the world, reinforcing our reputation as a global leader in aluminum profile manufacturing. We invite you to explore our comprehensive range of products and experience the exceptional quality and service that distinguish us in the competitive landscape. Partner with us to bring sophistication, durability, and environmental responsibility to your projects, and letâ€™s build a sustainable future together.
standard-item-dic: Aluminum standard profiles are widely used in various industries including construction, automotive, and manufacturing. Their lightweight, durable, and corrosion-resistant properties make them ideal for structural components, shelving systems, and machinery frames. These profiles also find applications in modern kitchen designs for cabinets, shelving, and lighting systems.
handrail-item-dic: Handrail profiles are designed for safety and aesthetics, commonly used in staircases, balconies, and industrial settings. Made from durable materials, they provide secure support while enhancing the visual appeal of any space. These profiles are ideal for both indoor and outdoor applications, ensuring long-lasting performance.
aldox-item-dic: Aldox profiles are highly durable and versatile aluminum solutions, widely used in construction, automotive, and industrial sectors. Known for their strength and aesthetic appeal, they are ideal for applications such as window frames, machinery components, and energy systems. These profiles offer long-lasting performance and design flexibility.
advertising-item-dic: Turkal Aluminium offers high-quality aluminium profiles for your advertising and promotional needs. Durable, stylish, and available in various design options, they perfectly complement your projects. Make your advertising solutions shine with Turkal Aluminium!
awning-item-dic: Turkal Aluminium offers durable and aesthetically pleasing aluminum profiles for your awning solutions. Stand out with eye-catching designs and high-quality standards that enhance your projects. Make your outdoor spaces more stylish and protected with Awning Profiles!
c-60-item-dic: C-60 profiles are strong, versatile aluminum profiles commonly used in structural and industrial applications. They provide excellent support and stability in construction, machinery, and framing systems. With their durability and ease of assembly, C-60 profiles are ideal for building custom frameworks and various structural solutions.
carpet-item-dic: Turkal Aluminium offers high-quality carpet edging trims designed to provide a seamless and polished finish. These trims enhance the durability and aesthetic appeal of carpeted areas, ensuring a professional look. Upgrade the functionality and style of your carpets with Carpet Edging Trims. For more details, please visit:
closed-item-dic: Turkal Aluminium offers superior quality in closed round edge trims. With durable, aesthetic, and functional designs, they seamlessly integrate into your projects. Enhance the elegance and longevity of your projects with Closed Round Edge Trims! For more details, please visit:
facade-item-dic: Turkal Aluminium offers high-quality aluminum profiles for your facade systems. With durable and aesthetic designs, they give your buildings a modern and sophisticated look. Enhance the impact and longevity of your projects with Facade System Profiles!
flyscreen-item-dic: Flyscreen profiles are specially designed aluminum profiles used to create durable and efficient insect screens for doors and windows. These profiles ensure a secure fit for flyscreens, providing protection against insects while allowing for ventilation and natural light. Ideal for residential, commercial, and industrial spaces, they combine functionality with a sleek, modern design.
furniture-item-dic: Furniture profiles are versatile aluminum profiles used to create sturdy, stylish, and customizable furniture designs. Ideal for shelving units, tables, cabinets, and other furniture, these profiles provide strength, durability, and a modern aesthetic. They are perfect for both residential and commercial applications, offering easy assembly and long-term performance.
glass-item-dic: Glass base profiles are aluminum profiles designed to securely hold and support glass panels in various applications. These profiles provide stability and enhance the aesthetic appeal of glass installations, such as partitions, railings, and facades. With their sleek design and durability, glass base profiles offer a modern and reliable solution for both residential and commercial spaces.
heater-item-dic: Turkal Aluminium offers perfect aluminum profiles for your heating solutions. Durable, efficient, and with aesthetic designs, they add value to your projects. Make your heating systems more reliable and stylish with Heater Profiles!

Known for their corrosion resistance and lightweight design, they are ideal for maximizing the efficiency and longevity of solar energy systems.

a-comprehensive-guide-to-the-aluminum-pr: A Comprehensive Guide to the Aluminum Production Process
extrusion-item-1: Extrusion is the cornerstone of aluminum production. In this process, a solid aluminum billet is heated to the proper temperature and then forced through a specially designed die to create a continuous, uniform profile.
the-aluminum-billet-is-gradually-heated-: The aluminum billet is gradually heated in controlled ovens until it reaches a pliable state. This softening prepares the metal for shaping.
the-heated-billet-is-pushed-by-a-powerfu: The heated billet is pushed by a powerful ram through a precision-engineered die. The shape of the die defines the final profile of the product.
once-extruded-the-continuous-aluminum-pr: Once extruded, the continuous aluminum profile is cooled to retain its shape and then cut into the desired lengths.
polishing-item-1: Polishing refines the extruded aluminum profile by removing surface imperfections. This process not only enhances the aesthetic appeal but also improves the profileâ€™s corrosion resistance.
polishing-item-2: The profile is first cleaned to remove any residual roughness or contaminants.
polishing-item-3: Specialized polishing machines gently buff the surface, eliminating micro-scratches and producing a sleek, reflective finish.
polishing-item-4: A final inspection ensures that the profile meets the desired levels of smoothness and shine.
punching-item-1: Punching involves creating precise holes or patterns in the aluminum profile. This step is essential for designs that require additional functionality, such as joining elements or aesthetic features.
punching-item-2: Custom-made dies are carefully positioned to mark where holes or patterns should be created.
punching-item-3: High-precision punching machines strike the profile with controlled force, forming exact holes or decorative cutouts.
punching-item-4: Each punched profile is examined to ensure that the holes are accurately placed and of the correct dimensions.
powder-coating-item-1: Powder coating applies a protective and decorative finish to the aluminum profile. This process uses dry powder that, when cured, forms a hard, durable layer on the surface.
powder-coating-item-2: A blend of pigments, resins, and additives is mixed to create the coating powder.
powder-coating-item-3: The aluminum profile is passed through an electrostatic spray system, which evenly distributes the powder across its surface.
powder-coating-item-5: The coated profile is baked in an oven, where the powder melts and chemically bonds to form a robust, lasting finish.
anodizing-item-1: Anodizing is an electrochemical process that thickens the naturally occurring oxide layer on the aluminum surface, enhancing both its durability and appearance.
anodizing-item-2: Anodizing is an electrochemical process that thickens the naturally occurring oxide layer on the aluminum surface, enhancing both its durability and appearance.
anodizing-item-4: The heated billet is pushed by a powerful ram through a precision-engineered die. The shape of the die defines the final profile of the product.
anodizing-item-6: A controlled electrical current is applied, causing the aluminum to develop a thicker, more uniform oxide layer.
packaging-item-1: Packaging is the final step, ensuring that the finished aluminum profiles are securely prepared for shipping and delivery. Proper packaging safeguards the product against damage during transit.
packaging-item-2: Each profile is carefully wrapped with protective materials to prevent scratches and other damages.
packaging-item-4: The products are clearly labeled with all necessary information, such as dimensions, specifications, and handling instructions.
packaging-item-6: Finally, the profiles are placed in high-quality cartons and arranged systematically for safe and efficient transport.

turkal-faq-1: Which industries does Turkal Aluminium serve?
turkal-faq-1-answer: Turkal Aluminium provides specialized aluminum profile solutions for various industries, including construction, automotive, aerospace, furniture, energy, electronics, and manufacturing. It develops solutions tailored to each sector by offering both standard and custom-designed profiles based on customer needs.
turkal-faq-2: Can custom-designed aluminum profiles be produced?
turkal-faq-2-answer: Yes, Turkal Aluminium can produce aluminum profiles in custom sizes and shapes according to customer requests. It provides tailored solutions in technical drawings, material selection, and production stages to meet project-specific needs.
turkal-faq-3: What quality standards are applied in production?
turkal-faq-3-answer: Turkal Aluminium manufactures in compliance with Turkish Standards Institute (TSE) certifications. Products are tested for durability, strength, and environmental factors to ensure the highest quality level for customers.
turkal-faq-4: Which countries are the products exported to?
turkal-faq-4-answer: Turkal Aluminium exports to all continents, including Europe, Asia, Africa, North and South America, and Oceania. It serves a wide customer base in the global market with competitive prices and high-quality products.
